basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. W. David Baird Endowed Scholarship in Oklahoma and Native American History
basic_information.scholarship_notes: This scholarship will be awarded out of the CLA Annual Fund this year (2024-2025 academic year).

description: This scholarship was established by Dr. Patricia Loughlin in honor of Edmond native and UCO alumnus, Dr. David Baird. Dr. Baird has authored many books, articles, and papers on the history of the American West and especially the history of Native Americans. This scholarship recognizes a History and Geography student who demonstrates high academic achievement in their specific area of study and class standing. Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate student Geography, History, or History Education major Minimum 3.0 GPA Sophomore or above Continuing student in the fall semester that the scholarship is awarded
